title: PCFA Operations Manager Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at IMD - International Institute for Management Development (Lausanne)
Interview Descriptions: I had 2 interviews, one with HR and one with line manager. The interview was easy, they asked very general questions. I got the job but declined / low salary offer

title: MBA Recruitment and Admissions Advisor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at IMD - International Institute for Management Development in Apr 2023
Interview Descriptions: After applying online, I was contacted to participate in a 30-minute Zoom interview. During the interview, I was surprised to find that there were 3 interviewers. This was my first direct interaction with the company, and I felt that it was unusual to interview with so many people right off the bat. The questions asked were straightforward and informal, but the interview went on for too long, leaving me with little time to ask my own questions on the role and the team. However, the biggest disappointment for me was receiving a generic rejection email (i.e., a very automatic/standard one) with no opportunity to respond and seek feedback. Given that I not only applied online and considering that only few people were shortlisted, I was hoping for a more personalized response. As a result, my overall candidate experience was unsatisfactory.
Interview Questions: Tell me about yourself? Why would you like to join IMD? What kind of programs do we offer? How would you convince me to apply to our programs (i.e., case-scenario)? Can you tell me about a difficult situation? What are your strengths and a weaknesses? And why? How do you cope with stress? Can you give a practical example? How have you solved a difficult situation? Why would you be suitable for the position? What is something that caught your attention of IMD?

title: Research Associate Interview

Interview Questions: What are your research strengths and interests.

title: MBA Coordinator Interview

title: Content Writer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at IMD - International Institute for Management Development (Lausanne) in Apr 2019
Interview Descriptions: It was a long time ago and it was fine. I no longer work there and neither does the interviewer. It was very nice. The team was great but none of them are there any longer.

title: PC&FA Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at IMD - International Institute for Management Development (Lausanne) in Apr 2018
Interview Descriptions: First Cover letter was sent then was asked to come in for 3 interviews: one with HR, one with our Head of Operations and one with two team members that have had a lot of experience in the role. They were all very nice, easy to talk to, comfortable environment. Just talking about past experiences in event management, challenges you've faced, how you solved a problem, how you work with different cultures etc. After I left and they said they would contact me should I get the job, I got the reply within 1 week.
Interview Questions: What is the biggest challenge you've had to face? How did you solve it?

title: IT Support Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at IMD - International Institute for Management Development (Lausanne) in Dec 2013
Interview Descriptions: Friendly and professional with plenty of opportunities to ask questions and meet with the staff. Two rounds of interviews and verification of references. The process was very simple and speedy, I guess having some internal references would have made it even faster.
Interview Questions: They asked about my experience working in a multicultural environment and how do I feel when dealing with cultural differences in the world of business.

title: Program Coordinator and Faculty Assistant Interview
